Uses of Class
org.codehaus.jackson.map.DeserializationConfig.Feature

  • Packages that use DeserializationConfig.Feature 
    Package Description
    org.codehaus.jackson.jaxrs
    Jackson-based JAX-RS provider that can automatically serialize and deserialize resources for JSON content type (MediaType).
    org.codehaus.jackson.map
    Contains basic mapper (conversion) functionality that allows for converting between regular streaming json content and Java objects (beans or Tree Model: support for both is via ObjectMapper class, as well as convenience methods included in JsonParser

    • Uses of DeserializationConfig.Feature in org.codehaus.jackson.jaxrs

      JacksonJsonProvider JacksonJsonProvider.configure(DeserializationConfig.Feature f, boolean state) 
      JacksonJsonProvider JacksonJsonProvider.disable(DeserializationConfig.Feature f, boolean state) 
      JacksonJsonProvider JacksonJsonProvider.enable(DeserializationConfig.Feature f, boolean state) 

    • Uses of DeserializationConfig.Feature in org.codehaus.jackson.map

      Methods in org.codehaus.jackson.map that return DeserializationConfig.Feature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DeserializationConfig.Feature DeserializationConfig.Feature.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static DeserializationConfig.Feature[] DeserializationConfig.Feature.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in org.codehaus.jackson.map with parameters of type DeserializationConfig.Feature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObjectMapper ObjectMapper.configure(DeserializationConfig.Feature f, boolean state)
      Method for changing state of an on/off deserialization feature for this object mapper.
      ObjectMapper ObjectMapper.disable(DeserializationConfig.Feature... f)
      Method for enabling specified DeserializationConfig features.
      void DeserializationConfig.disable(DeserializationConfig.Feature f)
      Deprecated. 
      Since 1.9, it is preferable to use DeserializationConfig.without(org.codehaus.jackson.map.DeserializationConfig.Feature...) instead; this method is deprecated as it modifies current instance instead of creating a new one (as the goal is to make this class immutable)
      ObjectMapper ObjectMapper.enable(DeserializationConfig.Feature... f)
      Method for enabling specified DeserializationConfig features.
      void DeserializationConfig.enable(DeserializationConfig.Feature f)
      Deprecated. 
      Since 1.9, it is preferable to use DeserializationConfig.with(org.codehaus.jackson.map.DeserializationConfig.Feature...) instead; this method is deprecated as it modifies current instance instead of creating a new one (as the goal is to make this class immutable)
      boolean ObjectMapper.isEnabled(DeserializationConfig.Feature f)
      Convenience method, equivalent to:
      boolean Module.SetupContext.isEnabled(DeserializationConfig.Feature f) 
      boolean DeserializationContext.isEnabled(DeserializationConfig.Feature feat)
      Convenience method for checking whether specified on/off feature is enabled
      boolean DeserializationConfig.isEnabled(DeserializationConfig.Feature f)
      An overload for MapperConfig.isEnabled(MapperConfig.ConfigFeature), needed for backwards-compatibility.
      void DeserializationConfig.set(DeserializationConfig.Feature f, boolean state)
      Deprecated. 
      Since 1.9, it is preferable to use DeserializationConfig.without(org.codehaus.jackson.map.DeserializationConfig.Feature...) and DeserializationConfig.with(org.codehaus.jackson.map.DeserializationConfig.Feature...) instead; this method is deprecated as it modifies current instance instead of creating a new one (as the goal is to make this class immutable)
      DeserializationConfig DeserializationConfig.with(DeserializationConfig.Feature... features)
      Fluent factory method that will construct and return a new configuration object instance with specified features enabled.
      DeserializationConfig DeserializationConfig.without(DeserializationConfig.Feature... features)
      Fluent factory method that will construct and return a new configuration object instance with specified features disabled.
